DOC.detailed_description: Bulimia nervosa ( BN ) binge eat disorder ( BED ) serious eat disorder characterize frequent uncontrolled eating binge . Binge eat associated psychological physical health problem , depression , obesity , stomach problem , heart problem . Treatment option binge eating , however , limited . Baclofen , drug enhances GABA-B neurotransmitter 's ability inhibit neuronal activity brain , commonly use muscle relaxant . It also show , however , positive effect binge eat use animal substance abuse use human . This study evaluate effectiveness baclofen reduce binge eat associate food craving people BN BED . People interested participate study first report study site two initial visit , involve blood test interview regard medical history . If eligible , participant take part 13-week open-label study . Participants take baclofen 3 time day , meal , 10 week . Baclofen dosages low begin , follow gradual increase 2-week period . Upon reach maximum tolerate dose baclofen , participant continue dosage level Week 11 , time dose gradually decrease . If serious side effect occur , baclofen dosage decrease previous tolerated dosage level . Participants also keep daily record episodes binge eat . Study visit hold biweekly . At visit , participant interview psychiatrist mental health history eat pattern , fill questionnaire eat habit , emotional state , side effect . Phone interview conduct week study visit .
